description: Mentioned only in passing by Irwin, who says only that it may be used to make a Vox Angelica. We can assume it to be a soft Dolcan. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Vox Angelica. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only. EchoDolcan.html - Last updated 27 February 2000. Home Full Index
